Ryan's Catering

Owned and operated by Ryan Blakeley in Denver, Colorado.

Classically trained chef specializing in American fine dining.

  • Contact
  1. Clean. Food is handled with care like I would want to feed myself and my family. Everything is cleaned and kept at appropriate temperatures, to a high standard. We reduce exposure to plastics.
  2. Attentive without being noticed. Communication that suits you. With private catering, I come to you, cook, clean, and get out of there. I'm happy to chat, but working quietly is something I enjoy. I respect your space.
  3. Under-promise, over-deliver. If you're not satisfied I will make it right.
